channel.title: Gameframe Changer
channel.description:
Hey guys,
So...i'm using a PI client and server and when you login you're gameframe is automatically 474. In the settings you can change it to 483 after but that is pretty hard to find.
So my question is. How can i make it so that when you first login your client is already set to 483 instead to 474. Could use some help, tyvm.

item.title: Gameframe Changer
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Lethal Sir Lethal
item.description:
@Sir_Lethal wrote:

Hey guys,

So…i’m using a PI client and server and when you login you’re gameframe is automatically 474.
In the settings you can change it to 483 after but that is pretty hard to find.

So my question is. How can i make it so that when you first login your client is already set to 483 instead to 474.
Could use some help, tyvm.
